Title: AN ACT GIVING THE NAME OF ROMERO SALAS TO THE DIVISORIA STREET, ERMITA, CITY OF MANILA.
Data:
[ Act No. 3675, July 25, 1930 ]
AN ACT GIVING THE NAME OF ROMERO SALAS TO THE DIVISORIA STREET, ERMITA, CITY OF MANILA.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. The Divisoria Street, Ermita, City of Manila, shall hereafter be known as Romero Salas Street, in memory of the illustrious Spanish journalist, Don Jose Maria Romero Salas.1a—àphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved, July 25, 1930.
